entry.title: https://github.com/mikeroyal/Self-Hosting-Guide
entry.content: Self-Hosting Guide. Learn all about locally hosting (on premises & private web servers) and managing software applications by yourself or your organization. Including Cloud, LLMs, WireGuard, Automation, Home Assistant, and Networking.

entry.title: https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-swag
entry.content: Nginx webserver and reverse proxy with php support and a built-in Certbot (Let's Encrypt) client. It also contains fail2ban for intrusion prevention.
